body:
#20384 introduced better checking with a `flake8` plugin.  This also means that certain issues like trailing whitespace on long lines, that were previously masked by appending of things like `# noqa: E501`, now show up.

This PR ensures that all packages pass the style check so people don't run into foreign errors in their PRs.

- [x] fix trailing whitespace and other issues uncovered by better `flake8` checking in 
- [x] fix superfluous whitespace printed by `spack style` command
title: style: ensure that all packages pass `spack style -a`
